sentences.en: A kindly landlady is obliging and cheerful in her old age.
sentences.cn: 一位和善的女房东,她已到了老年,亲切而愉快.

sentences.en: He likes being mothered by his landlady.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢女房东无微不至地照顾他.

sentences.en: He turned hungrily on the simple fare that our landlady had provided.
sentences.cn: 他饥肠辘辘地转向女房东拿来的简单食品.

sentences.en: His landlady appeared to be slightly off her rocker.
sentences.cn: 看来他的女房东有点疯疯癫癫.

sentences.en: I heard my landlady creeping stealthily up to my door.
sentences.cn: 我听到我的女房东偷偷地来到我的门前.

sentences.en: I proposed trusting the secret to my landlady.
sentences.cn: 我提议把这秘密告诉我的女房东.

sentences.en: On Sundays his landlady provided dinner as well as breakfast.
sentences.cn: 星期天,他的女房东不但供给早餐,还供给晚餐.

sentences.en: The food was bad. The landlady called it French cooking.
sentences.cn: 伙食很糟糕, 女房东把这样的伙食称之为法国式的烹调.

sentences.en: The landlady came over to serve me.
The landlady found they had been illegally subletting the flat.
sentences.cn: 女房东发现他们一直在违法转租公寓.

sentences.en: The landlady is angry because the rent is overdue.
sentences.cn: 女房东生气了,因为房租过期未付.

sentences.en: The landlady looked through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 女老板巴着门上的钥匙孔儿,往屋里看去.

sentences.en: The landlady patted her hair nervously.
sentences.cn: 女房东焦虑地轻抚着她的头发。

sentences.en: The landlady turned out a tenant for not paying the rent.
sentences.cn: 女房东赶走了一名不交房租的房客.

sentences.en: There was a note under the door from my landlady.
sentences.cn: 门下有我女房东的一张便条。

sentences.en: We had been made homeless by our landlady.
sentences.cn: 我们被女房东弄得无家可归。

trans.tran_cn: 女房东，女地主，（旅店或寄宿舍的）女店主
trans.tran_en: a woman who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone
